name: Solo Adventure Walk
description: One-on-one attention for your pup. Perfect for dogs who prefer solitude or need special attention. Includes water breaks and basic commands reinforcement.

name: Group Park Adventure
description: Socialization fun at the local park! Great for energetic dogs who love making friends. Supervised group play and exercise.

name: Puppy Introduction
description: Gentle introduction to walking for puppies 3-12 months. Focus on leash training and positive reinforcement.

name: Senior Stroll
description: Gentle, slow-paced walks tailored to senior dogs. Focus on comfort, short routes, and mobility support.
